content: LOS ANGELES  Sept 13 Sanderson Farms Inc shareholders have filed another proposal aimed at convincing the third-largest U.S. poultry producer to stop giving medically important antibiotics to healthy chickens for disease prevention.

title: Investors renew push to get Sanderson Farms to cut antibiotic use

content: LOS ANGELES  June 22 The parent of Burger King and Tim Hortons on Thursday vowed to  cut the use of antibiotics in its chicken supply  joining other major fast-food chain operators in the battle against the rise of dangerous antibiotic-resistant bacteria known as superbugs.

content: CHICAGO  April 13 Global outbreaks of bird flu in poultry have altered the flow of U.S. chicken meat  eggs and grain around the world  adding to challenges faced by domestic exporters and giving a leg up to Brazil  which has so far escaped the disease.

content: NEW YORK Sanderson Farms Inc  the third largest U.S. poultry producer  plans to continue using antibiotics on its birds partly because there are no alternatives on the horizon for treating a deadly but common gut disease  Chief Executive Officer Joe Sanderson said on Wednesday.
name: Sanderson Farms Inc
title: Sanderson sees no alternatives to antibiotic use in chicken production
